snippet: Facebook has revamped its profile pages to its new Timeline layout, and it will become the standard for every user within the next few weeks.
abstract: Facebook revamps its profile pages to its new Timeline layout, and it will become the standard for every user; layout includes an index of every post a user has ever made, with customizable privacy settings and the ability to highlight or delete from public view specific entries.
lead_paragraph: Facebook has revamped its profile pages to its new Timeline layout, and it will become the standard for every user within the next few weeks.

headline.seo: Ready or Not, Time to Share More
headline.main: Ready or Not, Time to Share More
